SEARCH
Package com.dreamwork.service

Class CandidateService

java.lang.Object
com.dreamwork.service.CandidateService
@Service public class CandidateService extends Object
Service class for managing candidate operations This class handles CRUD operations for candidates, authentication and logic integration

  • Constructor Details

    • CandidateService

      @Autowired public CandidateService(CandidateRepository candidateRepository, org.springframework.security.crypto.password.PasswordEncoder passwordEncoder, AuthenticationService authenticationService, JobAdRepository jobAdRepository)
      Constructor for dependencies.
      Parameters:
      candidateRepository - repository for managing Candidate entities
      passwordEncoder - encoder for security
      authenticationService - service for managing authenticated user operations
      jobAdRepository - repository for managing Job Ad entities

  • Method Details

    • saveCandidate

      @Transactional public void saveCandidate(UserDTO user)
      This method saves a new candidate to the database.
      Parameters:
      user - the user details (username, password, name, lastname, email)
      Throws:
      UserAlreadyExistsException - if username or email already exists

    • updateCandidate

      @Transactional public void updateCandidate(Candidate updatedCandidate, String password)
      This method updates authenticated Candidate details.
      Parameters:
      updatedCandidate - the updated Candidate details
      password - the current password for authentication
      Throws:
      IncorrectPasswordException - if the password is invalid

    • deleteCandidate

      @Transactional public boolean deleteCandidate(String deletePassword)
      Deletes the candidate's account.
      Parameters:
      deletePassword - the password for authentication
      Returns:
      true if the deletion was successful
      Throws:
      IncorrectPasswordException - if the password is invalid

    • viewCv

      @Transactional public Candidate viewCv(Long candidateId)
      This method retrieves the cv file of a candidate by their ID.
      Parameters:
      candidateId - the ID of the candidate
      Returns:
      Candidate entity with CV details
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if the candidate does not exist
      CvFileNotFoundException - if the cv file is not found

    • getAllCandidatesForJobAd

      @Transactional(readOnly=true) public List<CandidateDTO> getAllCandidatesForJobAd(Long jobAdId)
      This method retrieves all candidates who applied for a specific job ad.
      Parameters:
      jobAdId - the ID of the job ad
      Returns:
      list of CandidateDTO objects representing the candidates
      Throws:
      JobAdNotFoundException - if the job ad is not found
